downloadMessage.message: Download iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Bookmarks.

extDescription.message: Keep your Firefox bookmarks on Windows up to date with the Safari bookmarks on your iPhone, iPad and Mac.

syncedMessage.message: Your Firefox bookmarks are synced with iCloud.

enableBookmarksMessage.message: Enable Bookmarks in iCloud for Windows to use iCloud Bookmarks with Firefox.

userConsentMessage.message:
Your Firefox bookmarks will be synced to iCloud so they are available on all your devices.

If you choose not to allow us to collect your bookmarks, this extension is not useful.

Full details about the personal data we collect and what we do with it are provided in our Privacy Policy.

userConsentAllowButton.message: Yes, please collect my personal data in accordance with Apple's Privacy Policy

userConsentDenyButton.message: No, do not collect my personal data

uninstallMessage.message: Since you don't agree to the collection of bookmarks, we recommend you remove iCloud Bookmarks.

showUserConsentMessage.message: You need to agree to the data collected by iCloud Bookmarks before bookmarks can be synced.
